description:
Did you know that Snapchat is the fastest growing social network? With 100 million daily active users, 6 billion daily video views; Snapchat is used by more than 60% of 13 â€“ 34 year olds in the U.S., a demographic which is expected to outspend Baby Boomers by 2017.

In this course, you will learn...
- How to set up your Snapchat account
- Utilize all of the features and tools on Snapchat
- Engagement techniques
- Exclusive Growth Hacks + Tricks

This comprehensive step by step interactive course will walk you through the details of this social network with visual examples and video guides helping you understand the complexity of the Snapchat Interface. By the end of this course you will have learned how to navigate Snapchat, create compelling content and engage with your friends like a pro!

BONUS: Snapchat Mastermind group on Facebook: As a student of this course you can ask your instructors (Carlos & Saba) questions and network with fellow Snapchat Users!
title: Snapchat for Beginners - Understanding the Basics
